about_the_game:
The Rule of SHE is a role-playing game that delves into the enigmatic character of SHE. In this ever-shifting world, reality and time are constantly in flux, and each scenario introduces a different set of rules that must be followed.

Any violation of these rules will bring misfortune upon yourself. Adhere to them to uncover the truth and delve into the deepest secrets of SHE. Only when you have gained enough understanding of this eerie world will the time for successful reincarnation arrive.

1, A poetic, short narrative-driven puzzle game.

2, A bizarre and slightly eerie worldview accompanied by up to 20 original BGMs.

3, A carefully designed puzzle gameplay where switching between multiple characters can trigger different storylines.

4, The game includes boss battles and chase mechanics.

1, This is not a game with a single storyline. Please, explore all branching narratives.

2, Do not trust me; trust the rules established in each room of the game.

3, Remember to turn on the lights during your gameplay.

4, The game’s rules do not apply to your real-world life.

5, If you’re caught in a dilemma, trust your instincts.

If rules open pathways to the deeper layers of this world, what happens when they’re broken?  Between reality and illusion, will you still remember who you are?

short_description: A wandering soul mistakenly enters a world of strange tales and odd rules. Beware! This place is fraught with danger. To complete reincarnation, you must toe the line. Any soul that dares to go against the system will face correction. Will you comply—or defy?
